title: kidoola Foam Baby Play Mat (29x29cm) – Thick & Soft EVA Foam Interlocking Floor Tile Matting for Children – Safe & Comfortable 7mm Thick Play Flooring (27pc) - Pink
features: SAFE PLAY – These colourful, soft play mat tiles will brighten up any room and provide your precious child with a nice, cushioned play area where they can express themselves without you worrying about knocks or injuries from falling over
LARGE AREA – Providing coverage of an area of 2.25 Sqm (Square Meters) when fully used and should provide a big, padded space for your kids to play in!

FITS YOUR SPACE – Give yourself to option of using any shape and size to fit your room by using these interlocking jigsaw-like pieces however you need this to be done. Customise these mats to suit your needs, whenever, wherever
EASY CLEAN – We know your kids can be messy so we have made this to be cleaned easy with just a damp cloth, for any spills or accidents that may occur during play

FRIENDLY MATERIAL – We constructed with high-quality EVA foam, not only to help protect your children from banging themselves on the floor, but also remain safe and responsible by ensuring these are non-toxic, 100% free from latex, phthalates or lead. These are perfectly safe for children
description: Product Description Soft Play Mat Tiles - Safe, Cushioned, and Customizable Play Area for Kids Create a Safe and Fun Play Space with Our Colourful, Easy-to-Clean, Interlocking Foam Mats Give your little one a safe and soft area to play with our colourful play mat tiles, designed to cushion their falls and provide hours of fun. Covering up to 0.75 square meters, these interlocking mats can be arranged in any shape to fit your space perfectly. Made from high-quality, non-toxic EVA foam, they ensure a safe play environment free from harmful chemicals like latex, phthalates, and lead. Easy to clean with just a damp cloth, these mats are perfect for dealing with spills and messes.
